rows.label: tev031501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev031501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Chiopitus about the Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev031501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Chiopitus if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev031501_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Chiopitus about recent events.

rows.label: tev031501_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask Chiopitus what he did during the attack.

rows.label: tev031501_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Chiopitus about the Nopon.

rows.label: tev031501_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Chiopitus about recent events.

rows.label: tev031501_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ma-non are generally positive thinkers, but even we
felt our hearts racing as the Ganglion surrounded us
in Oblivia, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG0002
rows.name:
Thanks to that, I was able to directly experience the
emotion of "despair," which isn't something I really
have a lot of experience with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG0003
rows.name:
I should very much like to experience it again
without the attendant threat to life and limb,
if such a thing is possible?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG0008
rows.name:
Excuse me, but I would like to observe the full range of
human facial expression. Would you mind getting
angry for 20 seconds, then happy for 10?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG0009
rows.name: Er, you seem a bit...perplexed by my request?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG0010
rows.name:
How...interesting? I've been going about asking this
favor of every human that I meet, and yet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG0011
rows.name:
Well, they all seem to react with the same anomalous
facial expression as as you have right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG0012
rows.name:
Why do you refuse to cooperate? One would think
our friendship treaty provides the perfect opportunity
for our races to understand each other, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG1001
rows.name:
The tremendous energy that Dana is emitting is called
"love," isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG1002
rows.name:
If all of humanity discharged this energy at once,
I think perhaps you might be able to conquer any foe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG1003
rows.name:
Maybe if I understand you better I can also become
loving and all-powerful?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG1008
rows.name:
Initially, I was determined to measure and quantify
these human emotions you call "fear" and "despair,"
but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG1009
rows.name:
But I ended up stopping the scanning halfway through,
even though I love measuring things, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG1010
rows.name:
Can you imagine seeing the ghastly transformation of
a peaceful city into a horrific battlefield strewn with the
unlucky fallen?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG1011
rows.name:
Well, let's just leave it at my saying that I have no wish
to witness or measure any such carnage again,
if that's all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG1015
rows.name:
Now that I have amassed an impressive collection of
emotive data for humans, I thought I might try my
hand at the Nopon next?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG1016
rows.name:
But when I pointed my scanner at the first of them,
a strange reading appeared on my screen.
And do you know what it said?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG1017
rows.name: "Unlock my feelings now for just 156 credits!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG1018
rows.name:
I don't know what kind of emotion is powerful enough
to reprogram my scanner, but it was both compelling
and absolutely...terrifying?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG2001
rows.name:
Do you suppose I can negate Dana's "sadness" by
giving her a watch like you did Pauline?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031501_MSG2002
rows.name:
...I see. So there is no cure for this "broken heart"
sickness you speak of? I fear I'll never be able to
measure the true diameter of love, will I?[ST:wait ]
